thread.title: Blue lighting induces relaxation, say Spanish researchers

title: Blue lighting induces relaxation, say Spanish researchers
text:
Blue lighting induces relaxation, say Spanish researchers 8:19am EDT - 01:49 
Blue lights are used in police cars, ambulances, and fire engines, to grab our attention. But far from causing stress, as you might assume, blue light could be used to treat acute stress, say Spanish researchers. Jim Drury
